participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly, down-to-earth, and optimistic. Enjoys simple pleasures and values companionship.
participant_1.background: I'm from the Midwest, where we drive big trucks and have big hands. I like the color red. I love sunny days. I love to clean. I enjoy long drives in the countryside and sometimes I spot my neighbour's pool boy.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful, observant, and family-oriented. Enjoys understanding the world around her and has a playful side.
participant_2.background: I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike. I live in a big city where I can be more anonymous, but I still need to go back to my hometown to take care of my parents. I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations. I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat. I moved to America when I was 14.

content.text: I love sunny days! They make me happy and I just love being outside. Do you feel the same way?
I do! I love going out for walks or even just sitting in the sun and reading a book. I think it's so relaxing.
I know, right? It's the best. What's your favorite thing to do on a sunny day?
I love going for walks with my dog. He's a big old golden retriever and he loves to run around.
That sounds so fun! I love dogs. They're the best.
Me too! They're such loving creatures.
Thanks! He's a really cute dog.
He is! Do you have any pets?
No, I don't. I've always wanted a dog, but I've never had the time for one.
Aww, that's too bad. They're really great companions.
I know, right? I'll definitely get one someday.
